Judul: Pengembangan modul IPA terpadu terintegrasi ayat-ayat Al-Qur'an pada materi air sebagai sumber kehidupan
Penulis: S Latifah - Jurnal Ilmiah Pendidikan Fisika Al-Biruni, 2015 - ejournal.radenintan.ac.id
Abstrak:
This research is a development research that aims to produce Interated IPA module product 
integrated with Al-Qur'an verses on the material of Water as the source of life, as a teaching …
